Class: YTSearcher

YTSearcher(apiKey, defaultoptionsopt)

YTSearcher A utiliy class that allows searching for videos, channels, or playlists on YouTube.

Constructor

new YTSearcher(apiKey, defaultoptionsopt)

constructor - Creates a YouTube Searcher object
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
apiKey stringOrObject A string representing the Api key, or an object with the keys: 'key' and an optional 'revealkey'. If 'revealkey' is given a value of true access to the api key will not be protected.
defaultoptions Object <optional>
 Optional default options to be used in every search.
Source:
  • YTSearcher.js, line 24

Methods

search(query, optionsopt) → {YTSearch}

search - searches a query with arbitrary options.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
query string The search query
options Object <optional>
 Custom options that override defaultoptions for this specific search.
Source:
  • YTSearcher.js, line 64

- The YTSearch object
